256:1: sati kṣantavye kṣamā syānnāsatītyapakāriṇāmapi sādhavo lābhamiva bahu manyante|
256:3: bodhisattvaḥ kilānyatamasminnaraṇyapradeśe paṅkasaṃparkātparuṣavapurṇīlameghaviccheda iva pādacārī vanamahiṣavṛṣo babhūva|
256:4: sa tasyāṃ durlabhadharmasaṃjñāyāṃ saṃmohabahulāyāmapi tiryaggatau vartamānaḥ paṭuvijñānatvānna dharmacaryānirudyogamatirbabhūva|
256:5: cirānuvṛttyevaḥ nibaddhabhāvā na taṃ kadācitkaruṇā mumoca|
256:6: ko'pi prabhāva sa tu karmaṇo vā tasyaiva vā yatsa tathā babhūva||1||
256:8: kṛpātmakaḥ sannapi yatsa bheje tiryaggatiṃ tatra ca dharmasaṃjñām||2||
256:9: vinā na karmāsti gatiprabandhaḥ śubhaṃ na cāniṣṭavipākamasti|
256:10: sa dharmasaṃjñīpi tu karmaleśāṃstāṃstān samāsādya tathā tathāsīt||3||
256:11: athānyatamo duṣṭavānarastasya kālāntarābhivyaktāṃ prakṛtibhadratāṃ dayānuvṛttyā ca vigatakrodhasaṃrambhatāmavetya nāsmādbhayamastīti taṃ mahāsattvaṃ tena tena vihiṃsākrameṇa bhṛśataramabādhata|
256:13: parāṃ vrajati vikriyāṃ na hi bhayaṃ tataḥ paśyati|
256:16: sa kadācittasya mahāsattvasya visrabdhaprasuptasya nidrāvaśādvā pracalāyataḥ sahasaivopari nipatati sma|
256:20: salilāvagāhanasamutsukasyāpyasya kadācicchiraḥ samabhiruhya pāṇibhyāṃ nayane samāvavre|
256:21: apyenamadhiruhya samudyatadaṇḍaḥ prasahyaiva vāhayan yamasya līlāmanucakāra|
256:22: bodhisattvo'pi mahasattvaḥ sarvaṃ tadasyāvinayaceṣṭitamupakāramiva manyamāno niḥsaṃkṣobhasaṃrambhamanyurmarṣayāmāsa|
256:25: atha kilānyatamo yakṣastamasya paribhavamamṛṣyamāno bhāvaṃ vā jijñāsamānastasya mahāsattvasya tena duṣṭakapinā vāhyamānaṃ taṃ mahiṣavṛṣabhaṃ mārge sthitvedamuvācamā tāvadbhoḥ ! kiṃ parikrīto'syanena duṣṭakapinā ?
256:28: utāho balamātmagataṃ nāveṣi yadevamanena paribhūya vāhyase ? nanu bhoḥ !
256:31: idaṃ ca śailopamasaṃhatasthiraṃ samagraśobhaṃ balasaṃpadā vapuḥ|
256:33: mathāna dhṛtvā tadimaṃ kṣureṇa vā viṣāṇakoṭyā madamasya voddhara|
256:35: asajjanaḥ kutra yathā cikitsyate guṇānuvṛttyā sukhaśīlasaumyayā|
256:36: kaṭuṣṇarūkṣākṣi hi yatra siddhaye kaphātmako roga iva prasarpati||9||
256:38: avaimyenaṃ calaṃ nūnaṃ sadā cāvinaye ratam|
256:39: ata eva mayā tvasya yuktaṃ marṣayituṃ nanu||10||
256:44: asatkriyā hīnabalāścca nāma nirdeśakālaḥ paramo guṇānām|
256:46: nityaṃ kṣamāyāśca nanu kṣamāyāḥ kālaḥ parāyattayā durāpaḥ|
256:47: pareṇa tasminnupapādite ca tatraiva kopapraṇa kopapraṇakramaḥ kaḥ||14||
256:49: na cetkṣamāmapyahamatra kuryāmanya kṛtaghno bata kīdṛśaḥ syāt||15||
256:50: yakṣa uvāca-tena hi na tvamasyāḥ kacācitprabādhanāyā mokṣyase-
256:54: parasya pīḍāpraṇayena yatsukhaṃ nivāraṇaṃ syādasukhodayasya vā|
256:55: sukhārthinastanna niṣevituṃ kṣamaṃ na tadvipāko hi sukhaprasiddhaye||17||
256:58: asatkriyāṃ prāpya ca tadvidhājjanānna mādṛśe'pyevamasau kariṣyati|
256:59: na labdhadoṣo hi punastathācaredataśca muktirmama sā bhaviṣayti||19||
256:60: atha yakṣastaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prasādavismayabahumānāvarjitamatiḥ sādhu sādhviti saśiraḥprakampāṅgalivikṣepamabhisaṃrādhya tattatpriyamuvāca-
256:62: kayāpi buddhyā tvidamāsthito vapustapovane ko'pi bhavāṃstapasyati||20||
256:63: ityenamabhipraśasya taṃ cāsya duṣṭavānaraṃ pṛṣṭhādavadhūya samādiśya cāsya rakṣāvidhānaṃ tatraivāntardadhe|
256:64: tadevaṃ sati kṣantavye kṣamā syānnāsatītyapakāriṇamapi sādhavo lābhamiva bahu manyante iti kṣāntikathāyāṃ vācyam|
256:66: ko nāma manuṣyabhūtaḥ pravrajitapratijño vā tadvikalaḥ śobheta ?
